Q: Can I upload a receipt for an item without one?\n\nA: Yes, find your item in the list, tap it, then press edit item and you will find the option in the lower left corner
Q: How can I get in touch with the developers?\n\nA: You can send us an email; appmemoru@gmail.com
Q: I uploaded an item with the wrong name, can I change it?\n\nA: Yes, simply find your item in the list, and tap edit item
Q: How do I add an item to my favorites?\n\nA: Tap the star next to the item in the item list, if it is yellow it is one of your favorite items and will be displayed before the non-favorite
